de.iftm.dcm4che.router.util
Class CommandLineOpt

java.lang.Object
  de.iftm.dcm4che.router.util.CommandLineOpt

public class CommandLineOpt
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the commandolineparsing. 2004.02.17 hacklaender: Name of default configuration file changed from framework.properties to router.properties.

checkLoggerProp

public boolean checkLoggerProp()
Checks wether a propertyfile for the Log4j-Logger exists in the home- or cfg-directory. If not "false" will be returned, else "true"
